唵字的基本解释

唵
ǎn
用手抓东西吃：“偷米唵之”。
佛教咒语用字。
含。

唵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ǎn］
［《廣韻》烏感切，上感，影。］
(1)以手进食。
(2)捱，困难地度过。
(3)佛教“六字真言”之一。
(4)谓低声敛气。
(5)通“俺”。我。
(6)见“唵噆”。
[②]［ng˙］
叹词。表示应答。

唵字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　唵； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页193第27
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?烏感切，音晻。【玉篇】含也。【廣韻】手進食也。　又【正字通】釋呪多用唵字。

暂无。

Om
Basic explanation of words
Om
ǎn
Grab something to eat with your hands: "Steal the rice 唵之".
Buddhist mantras use words.
Contain.
Om
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［ǎn］
["Guang Yun" Wu feels cut, upper sense, shadow. ]
(1) Eat with hands.
(2) To endure, get through with difficulty.
(3) One of the "six-character mantras" of Buddhism.
(4) It is said that the voice is kept in a low voice.
(5) Through "I". I.
(6) See "唵噆".
[②]［ng˙］
interjection. Indicates answer.
Om
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　唵; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 193-27
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Black sense, dark tone. [Jade articles] Han Ye. [Guang Yun] You can eat with your hands.　[Zhengzitong] Interpretation of 呪 often use the word 唵.
